data.title: Acquisition of Alesa by Group Réel from Rio Tinto Alcan
data.meta_description: Capitalmind Investec advised Groupe Reel on raising 50m in debt to finance its growth strategy and their latest acquisition of Alesa
data.text:
What we did

Sourced the opportunity for Groupe Réel and managed to get Groupe Réel up to speed as the disposal had been initiated by Rio Tinto Alcan 2 months earlier

Actively supported Groupe Réel all along this fast-track acquisition process: from preliminary review of documentation made available and drafting the qualifying NBO to organising and monitoring an effective due diligence process, till binding offer and definitive agreements negotiations.

Also assisted Groupe Réel during the mandatory social communication phase

Advised Groupe Réel on raising debt to finance its growth strategy, including the Alesa acquisition: from marketing materials preparation to pro-active management of discussions with banks and comparison of preliminary offers and negotiation of definitive financing agreements
